ChangeLog ChangeLog
========== ==========
version 0.5.2 (released 2011-09-17)
* Increased window size x10.
* Fixed SSHv1.
* Fixed bugged lists.
* Fixed use-after-free + inconsistent callbacks call in poll.
* Fixed scp documentation.
* Fixed possible infinite loop in channel_read().
* Fixed handling of short reads of sftp_async_read().
* Fixed handling request service timeout in blocking mode.
* Fixed ssh_auth_list() documentation.
* Fixed incorrect return values in ssh_channel_write().
* Fixed an infinite loop in the termination callback.
* Fixed handling of SSH_AGAIN in channel_open().
* Fixed "status -5 inflating zlib packet"
version 0.5.1 (released 2011-08-09) version 0.5.1 (released 2011-08-09)
* Added checks for NULL pointers in string.c. * Added checks for NULL pointers in string.c.
* Set the channel max packet size to 32768. * Set the channel max packet size to 32768.
* Don't (de)compress empty buffers. * Don't (de)compress empty buffers.
* Fixed ssh_scp_write so it works when doing recursive copy. * Fixed ssh_scp_write so it works when doing recursive copy.
* Fixed another source of endless wait. * Fixed another source of endless wait.
* Fixed an endless loop in case of a channel_open error. * Fixed an endless loop in case of a channel_open error.
* Fixed session timeout handling. * Fixed session timeout handling.
* Fixed ssh_channel_from_local() loop. * Fixed ssh_channel_from_local() loop.
* Fixed permissions of scp example when we copy a file. * Fixed permissions of scp example when we copy a file.
 End of changes. 1 change blocks.
